item.title: Hello Hello World
item.description: I’m Bastien Boutonnet, a lead data scientist at soda.io and an Amsterdam resident. I like to build and maintain open-source projects and tools for data practitioners, which I mostly do under the bitpicky umbrella. When I don’t write code, I produce music under several aliases one of which is accuraat and play other people’s music to other dancing people in clubs (well, before there was a pandemic that is). THE SOCIALS Twitter: @B_superhero Sometimes I tweet interesting stuff GitHub: @bastienboutonnet For my personal projects.

item.title: How to Stay on Top of Slack?
item.description: credits Getty Images TL;DR Use and abuse reminders! You can jump to the how to section if you are already sold on the idea. Slack has become one of the most popular workplace messaging platforms these days. This is especially true in newly established organisations. Being a really big proponent of using all things modern and having struggled all my life with finding a way to like email, I quickly embraced Slack as my favourite messaging app.
